component.name: dosbox-staging
component.summary: x86/DOS emulator with sound and graphics

description.p: dosbox-staging is a DOS-emulator using SDL for easy portability to different platforms.

dosbox-staging emulates a 286/386 realmode CPU, Directory FileSystem/XMS/EMS, a SoundBlaster card for excellent sound compatibility with older games... You can "re-live" the good old days with the help of DOSBox, it can run plenty of the old classics that don't run on your new computer!
